########################
# Final Configurations #
########################

p_initial_bottom = Point(14.30947309675787, 51.900475154651375)
p_initial_top = Point(14.30947309675787, 68.90047515465137)

p_initial_bottom.color = '#aa55aa'
p_initial_top.color = '#aa55aa'

bottom_initial = Segment(p_initial_bottom, p_501)
top_initial = Segment(p_initial_top, p_518)
p_final_bottom = Point(154.50545366411728, 72.77625307981285)
p_final_top = Point(154.50545366411728, 89.77625307981285)

p_final_bottom.color = '#aa55aa'
p_final_top.color = '#aa55aa'

bottom_final = Segment(p_final_bottom, p_591)
top_final = Segment(p_final_top, p_608)

bottom_0 = Segment(p_501, p_519)
top_0 = Segment(p_518, p_536)

print('Difference values for location tag PS-A14-501-A')
print('x-difference: 0.0')
print('y-difference: 0.0')
print('total-difference: 0.0')
print()

bottom_1 = Segment(p_519, p_537)
top_1 = Segment(p_536, p_554)

print('Difference values for location tag PS-A14-519-A')
print('x-difference: 19.974397807392236')
print('y-difference: 0.26892767579728627')
print('total-difference: 19.97620809520079')
print()

bottom_2 = Segment(p_537, p_555)
top_2 = Segment(p_554, p_572)

print('Difference values for location tag PS-A14-537-A')
print('x-difference: 40.00391830889278')
print('y-difference: 0.5672717007891563')
print('total-difference: 40.0079401775083')
print()

bottom_3 = Segment(p_555, p_573)
top_3 = Segment(p_572, p_590)

print('Difference values for location tag PS-A14-555-A')
print('x-difference: 60.03372610238965')
print('y-difference: 0.9345234101481452')
print('total-difference: 60.04099935661344')
print()

bottom_4 = Segment(p_573, p_591)
top_4 = Segment(p_590, p_608)

print('Difference values for location tag PS-A14-573-A')
print('x-difference: 80.00475759106568')
print('y-difference: 1.435463830771667')
print('total-difference: 80.0176342665455')
